data.title: First Time Attending the WVC Annual Conference?
data.meta_description: Is it your first time attending the WVC Annual Conference? Here are a few resources and links to help you plan your trip to the most exciting veterinary conference in the country.
data.text:
WVC First-Timers Guide

Whether this is your first time attending WVC, or your 96th time (hey, it's possible right?), we can't wait to welcome you to our home in sunny Las Vegas, NV. The 96th WVC Annual Conference features days of learning, exploration, networking, and fun.

If you're not sure where to start, we've put together a first-timers guide to help you get the most out of your WVC experience.

What is the WVC Annual Conference?

From what began as the Intermountain Livestock Sanitary Association in 1928, to what is now one of the largest and most exciting veterinary conferences in the country, the WVC Annual Conference is a place for all veterinarians, veterinary technicians, practice managers, students, and all other animal health industry members to gather.

Earn hundreds of CE hours by attending education sessions, explore innovations in the industry, and to relax and unwind with amazing entertainment all in the Heart of Las Vegas, NV.

Dates and Location:

The 97th WVC Annual Conference is hosted at the Mandalay Bay Convention Center, in heart of the Las Vegas, NV.

Dates: March 2-5.2025

Location: Mandalay Bay Convention Center

Registration Information + Badge Pickup

Where do I purchase my conference registration?

Once registration goes on sale, To register to attend the WVC Annual Conference, click here. If you haven't done so, you are required to create a My Viticus account.

To keep your details up-to-date, please use an active email address that you have access to, as this is one of our preferred methods of tracking your payment details and CE hours.

When will I be able to pick up my WVC badge?

All badges can be picked up at the Mandalay Bay Convention Center, Level 2 during the following times (subject to updates):

Saturday, March 1 | 3:00p – 6:00p Sunday, March 2 | 6:00a – 6:00p Monday, March 3 | 6:00a – 5:00p Tuesday, March 4 | 6:00a – 5:00p Wednesday, March 5 | 6:00a – 2:00p

BADGE ENCODING DISCLOSURE: As a WVC primary registrant, your contact information is automatically encoded into your badge. When the badge is scanned at the Exhibit Hall, the encoding supplies your name, mailing address, email address, telephone number, and fax number, if provided. This badge system replaces a business card and should be protected and should be scanned at your discretion.

Badges will be printed onsite. US or international ID is required.

Hotel and Lodging

The 96th WVC Annual Conference is hosted at Mandalay Bay Resort and Casino.

In addition to the host hotel, there are nearby hotels located in the area that offer discounted rates. When booking your hotel, be sure to factor in the cost of transportation. The Mandalay Bay, Luxor, and Excalibur are connected by tram, while the Four Seasons is located a short walk away.

Most other nearby hotels are approximately 1-2 miles away, a relatively short distance from the host hotel. If you are staying at a hotel that is not located near the host hotel, you may want to factor in the cost of taxis or rideshares.
